abstract.locale: Creating applications with Ample SDK is as simple as doing it with plain HTML and cross-browser DOM.
Нет ничего проще создания страничек с помощью Ample SDK. По большому счёту это ничем не отличается от обычной HTML разметки.

locale.p: The following sample application will display "Hello, World!" message in bold on the screen. Once text is clicked there will be an alert popup shown notifying on the event.

content.code: <!DOCTYPE html> <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> <head> <title>Hello, World!</title> <script type="text/javascript" src="ample/runtime.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="ample/languages/xhtml/xhtml.js"></script> <style type="text/ample+css"> @namespace x "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"; x|b { color: red; } </style> </head> <body> <script type="application/ample+xml" xmlns:x="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> <x:b onclick="alert('Element was clicked')">Hello, World!</x:b> </script> </body> </html>

note.locale: Please note, there is a prefix x defined on the <script /> tag that is bound to XHTML namespace.
